AT.name: Resident Evil Revelations
AT.description: Der gefeierte Survival-Horror-Titel Resident Evil™ Revelations kehrt auf die Konsolen zurück – überarbeitet in qualitativ hochwertiger HD-Grafik, verbesserten Lichteffekten und einem atemberaubenden Sound-Erlebnis. Die neueste Version von Resident Evil™ Revelations stellt außerdem zusätzliche Inhalte zur Verfügung. Dazu gehören ein grauenerregender neuer Gegner, ein zusätzlicher Schwierigkeitsgrad und Verbesserungen beim Raubzugmodus, wie etwa neue Waffen, Fähigkeiten und spielbare Charaktere – einschließlich Hunk und Rachael!

AU.name: Resident Evil Revelations
AU.description: The critically acclaimed survival horror title Resident Evil™ Revelations returns redefined for console complete with high quality HD visuals, enhanced lighting effects and an immersive sound experience. This latest version of Resident Evil Revelations will also deliver additional content including a terrifying new enemy, extra difficulty mode and improvements to RAID Mode such as new weapons, skill sets, and playable characters including Hunk and Rachael!

BG.name: Resident Evil Revelations
BG.description: The critically acclaimed survival horror title Resident Evil™ Revelations returns redefined for console complete with high quality HD visuals, enhanced lighting effects and an immersive sound experience. This latest version of Resident Evil Revelations will also deliver additional content including a terrifying new enemy, extra difficulty mode and improvements to RAID Mode such as new weapons, skill sets, and playable characters including Hunk and Rachael!

BE.name: Resident Evil Revelations
BE.description: Resident Evil™ Revelations, le grand jeu de survival-horror, arrive sur console avec des graphismes en HD, des effets de lumière améliorés et des effets sonores d'un réalisme saisissant. Cette nouvelle version de Resident Evil Revelations contiendra également du contenu supplémentaire dont un nouvel ennemi terrifiant et un mode de difficulté inédit, ainsi que plusieurs améliorations apportées au mode Commando : de nouvelles armes, de nouvelles capacités et de nouveaux personnages jouables comme Hunk et Rachael !

ES.name: Resident Evil Revelations
ES.description: El juego de terror de supervivencia aclamado por la crítica, Resident Evil™ Revelations, vuelve remasterizado para consola con imágenes en alta resolución de gran calidad, efectos de iluminación mejorados y una experiencia de sonido que te mete de lleno en la acción. Esta última versión de Resident Evil Revelations llega con contenidos adicionales, como un nuevo y aterrador enemigo, un modo de dificultad extra y mejoras en el modo Asalto como nuevas armas, conjuntos de habilidades y personajes con los que jugar como Hunk y Rachael.

IT.name: Resident Evil Revelations
IT.description: L'apprezzato titolo survival horror Resident Evil™ Revelations torna migliorato per console con una grafica HD di alta qualità, effetti di luce migliorati e un'esperienza audio immersiva. Inoltre, questa nuova versione si arricchisce di nuovi contenuti, come un nuovo e terrificante nemico, un livello di difficoltà avanzato e una modalità Raid migliorata con nuove armi, abilità e personaggi giocabili (compresi Hunk e Rachael)!

NL.name: Resident Evil Revelations
NL.description: De succesvolle survivalhorrortitel Resident Evil™ Revelations komt terug in een verbeterde consoleversie, compleet met hoogwaardig HD-beeld, verbeterde lichteffecten en een meeslepende geluidsbeleving. Deze nieuwste versie van Resident Evil Revelations bevat ook aanvullende content, waaronder een gruwelijke nieuwe vijand, een extra moeilijkheidsgraad en verbeteringen van het speltype RAID zoals nieuwe wapens, vaardighedensets en speelbare personages, onder wie Hunk en Rachael!

NZ.name: Resident Evil Revelations
NZ.description: The critically acclaimed survival horror title Resident Evil™ Revelations returns redefined for console complete with high quality HD visuals, enhanced lighting effects and an immersive sound experience. This latest version of Resident Evil Revelations will also deliver additional content including a terrifying new enemy, extra difficulty mode and improvements to RAID Mode such as new weapons, skill sets, and playable characters including Hunk and Rachael!

PL.name: Resident Evil Revelations
PL.description: The critically acclaimed survival horror title Resident Evil™ Revelations returns redefined for console complete with high quality HD visuals, enhanced lighting effects and an immersive sound experience. This latest version of Resident Evil Revelations will also deliver additional content including a terrifying new enemy, extra difficulty mode and improvements to RAID Mode such as new weapons, skill sets, and playable characters including Hunk and Rachael!

PT.name: Resident Evil Revelations
PT.description: O título de terror de sobrevivência, aclamado pela crítica, Resident Evil™ Revelations regressa redefinido para consola e completo com um aspeto visual HD de alta qualidade, efeitos de iluminação melhorados e uma experiência de som imersiva. Esta mais recente versão de Resident Evil Revelations também contará com conteúdo adicional, incluindo um novo e terrível inimigo, um modo de dificuldade adicional e melhoramentos no Modo RAID, como novas armas e conjuntos de capacidades, além de personagens jogáveis que incluem Hunk e Rachael!

RU.name: Resident Evil Revelations
RU.description: Знаменитая игра в жанре «ужаса выживания» Resident Evil™ Revelations возвращается! В переработанной для консолей версии игроков ждет высококачественное изображение в высоком разрешении, улучшенные эффекты освещения и впечатляющая звуковая панорама. В эту последнюю версию Resident Evil Revelations также включен дополнительный контент, в том числе ужасающие новые враги, дополнительный режим сложности и улучшения для режима "РЭЙД": новое оружие, наборы навыков и игровые персонажи — Ханк и Рэйчел!

SE.name: Resident Evil Revelations
SE.description: The critically acclaimed survival horror title Resident Evil™ Revelations returns redefined for console complete with high quality HD visuals, enhanced lighting effects and an immersive sound experience.
